name: PHOBIA (itch)
description:
First-person Shooter Survival Game, inspired by the flash game Boxhead.

Installation: unzip the zip archive and run Phobia_.exe

Download is about 225 MB.

v201804221225 Update:

  • Fixed wave and combo defaulted to 1 if the player clicked "Back" in the option screen without changing the difficulty after game over once.
  • Minor text fixes.

v201804190251 Update:

  •  added footstep sounds to robots
  • fixed bug where Esc still exits the pause state while help menu is open
  • UMP-45 80x reward : replaced with damage buff.  Base range increased to 75 units (from 25).
  • Handgun final magazine upgrade increases capacity by 20 (from 60).
  • fixed UI health bar not scaling to upgraded max health
  • lowered spawn cool down timer. Cooldown against wave mumber is now Reverse S pattern (from exponential decrease) (enemies now spawn slower early game). Number of enemies is unchanged.
  • minor text changes
  • minor bug fixes
